Package business

Class DepartmentSummary

java.lang.Object
business.DepartmentSummary
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDepartmentSummary
public class DepartmentSummary
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDepartmentSummary
Represents a summary of a department's information within the educational institution. This class provides comprehensive information about a department including its staff, students, and courses.

The class offers functionality for:

  • Generating basic and detailed department summaries
  • Managing department statistics
  • Accessing department members and courses
  • Printing formatted department information

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DepartmentSummary​(DepartmentId departmentId, int studentCount, int staffCount, java.util.List<Student> students, java.util.List<Staff> staff, java.util.List<Course> courses)
    Constructs a new DepartmentSummary instance with complete department information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getBasicSummary()
    Generates a basic summary of the department including name and member counts.
    DepartmentId getDepartmentId()
    Retrieves the unique identifier for the department.
    java.lang.String getDetailedInfo()
    Generates detailed information about the department including lists of all students, staff members, and courses.
    int getStaffCount()
    Retrieves the total number of staff members in the department.
    int getStudentCount()
    Retrieves the total number of students in the department.
    void printDetailedInfo()
    Prints detailed department information to the console.
    void printSummary()
    Prints the basic department summary to the console.

    • DepartmentSummary

      public DepartmentSummary​(DepartmentId departmentId, int studentCount, int staffCount, java.util.List<Student> students, java.util.List<Staff> staff, java.util.List<Course> courses)
      Constructs a new DepartmentSummary instance with complete department information.
      Parameters:
      departmentId - Unique identifier for the department
      studentCount - Total number of students
      staffCount - Total number of staff members
      students - List of all students in the department
      staff - List of all staff members in the department
      courses - List of all courses offered by the department
